about: Hello, My name Is MrMinecraftboy77, or S0lar on Planet Minecraft, Im a Builder in Minecraft. Ex-Member of Team Vareide (the team disbanded), I've helped with the production of Official Survival Games maps for The Hive and other servers such as Mineplex. Map Maker and Steampunk  Lover.
